original_title: In 927km rechts: Teil 1: Auf der anderen Seite des Fernsehers
overview: "A journey through Asia. Russia. Mongolia. Kazakhstan. Georgia. Armenia. Iran.  A 9 month time-out in a self made four-wheel van.  Together in a new relationship. 24/7 in a confined space.  With more break-downs and more unanticipated events than suspected.  But it formed us. It made us stronger."
tagline: A journey through Asia in three parts. 9 months. 12 countries. 30 000 km.
title: In 927km rechts: Teil 1: Auf der anderen Seite des Fernsehers
